string-array.name: description
string-array.item: The leopard is one of the five extant species in the genus Panthera, a member of the Felidae.
The lion is a species in the family Felidae and a member of the genus Panthera.
The tiger is the largest extant cat species and a member of the genus Panthera.
A wolf is a large canine native to Eurasia and North America.
